forecaster.forecast.living_expenses module¶

Provides a LivingExpensesForecast class for use by Forecast.

class forecaster.forecast.living_expenses.LivingExpensesForecast(initial_year, people, living_expenses_strategy)[source]¶

Bases: forecaster.forecast.subforecast.SubForecast

A forecast of each year’s living expenses.

Parameters

  • initial_year (int) – The first year of the forecast.

  • people (Iterable[Person]) –

    The people for whom the financial forecast is being generated. Typically a single person or a person and their spouse.

    Note that all Person objects must have the same this_year attribute, as must their various accounts.

  • living_expenses_strategy (LivingExpensesStrategy) – A callable object that determines the living expenses for the plannees for a year. See the documentation for LivingExpensesStrategy for acceptable args when calling this object.

living_expenses¶

The amount spent on living expenses (i.e. money not available to be saved).

Type

Money

__call__(available)[source]¶

Records transactions against accounts; mutates available.

__init__(initial_year, people, living_expenses_strategy)[source]¶

Initializes an instance of LivingExpensesForecast.

property living_expenses

Returns cached value in *_history dict if available.

property living_expenses_history¶

Record of living_expenses over all past years.

property transactions_history¶

Record of transactions over all past years.
